message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $110. I know how valuable it is, so I think this is a fair price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'd like to save as much as possible.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $100?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
